name: Lands of Shinoah
description:
Explore the Lands of Shinoah in this 2D rpg game inspired by the jrpg classics.

Troubles stir in the Lands of Shinoah.

Monsters have recently come out of their lairs
to decimate the populous. Travel around the lands
and discover the source of the threats.

Control four characters as they travel the lands of Shinoah with sword
and magic and defeat the evil that is present. You will travel to different
sites from ruins, caves, and floating castles to be successful in your quest.

Take control of four heroes in random battles, with turn-based combat. Fight
from a first-person perspective against the denizens of Shinoah as you explore
the ruins, castles, and caves of the land.
